channel.title: Surfing on D U N K
channel.description: Recent content in Surfing on D U N K

item.title: Patent NA25396 – A better method to transport a surfboard on a bike
item.description: The problem A possible solution The problem I live in San Francisco, an our city beach is exactly 4.7 miles away from my apartment in Haight. It’s a beautiful bike ride, but so far if I wanted to go surf I’d either have to rely on my friend Jake, who has a car, to also go right now, or take the N-Line on Muni which is unreliable (especially on weekends).
